markdownRemark.html:
At Sāvatthī.

“Mendicants, when what exists, because of grasping what and insisting on what, does the view arise: ‘The world is infinite’?” …

SN.24.13. Taṁjīvaṁtaṁsarīraṁsutta (“The Soul and the Body Are Identical”)
